extracted-table.table-caption: Correlation between ALPS indices and amyloid beta42/40 ratio
extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: Abbreviations: ALPS_R, ALPS_L: calculated ALPS index on right R and left L hemisphere of the brain. ALPS_comb: combined ALPS index, by calculating the mean of Index for right and left hemishphere; adj-R²: adjusted R²; SE: Standard error; * significant difference with P < 0.05. Calculated with multivariate linear regression analyses, using age, sex, years of education and diagnose (ADvsHC) as confounding variables

caption.p: Correlation between ALPS indices and amyloid beta42/40 ratio

table-wrap-foot.p: Abbreviations: ALPS_R, ALPS_L: calculated ALPS index on right R and left L hemisphere of the brain. ALPS_comb: combined ALPS index, by calculating the mean of Index for right and left hemishphere; adj-R²: adjusted R²; SE: Standard error; * significant difference with P < 0.05. Calculated with multivariate linear regression analyses, using age, sex, years of education and diagnose (ADvsHC) as confounding variables

extracted-table.table-caption: Group differences between AD (Alzheimers diesease dementia patients) and HC (healthy controls) in the DTI_ALPS-Index
extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: Abbreviation: ALPS_R, ALPS_L: calculated ALPS-Index on right R and left L hemisphere of the brain. ALPS_comb: combined ALPS-Index, by calculating the mean of Index for right and left hemisphere. SD: Standard deviation.* significant difference with P < 0.05. Participants with WMH contamination of the ALPS calculation were omitted from the analysis. Calculated using an ANOVA adjusted for age and sex

caption.p: Group differences between AD (Alzheimers diesease dementia patients) and HC (healthy controls) in the DTI_ALPS-Index

table-wrap-foot.p: Abbreviation: ALPS_R, ALPS_L: calculated ALPS-Index on right R and left L hemisphere of the brain. ALPS_comb: combined ALPS-Index, by calculating the mean of Index for right and left hemisphere. SD: Standard deviation.* significant difference with P < 0.05. Participants with WMH contamination of the ALPS calculation were omitted from the analysis. Calculated using an ANOVA adjusted for age and sex

extracted-table.table-caption: Correlation between ALPS indices and WMH found in the 5 mm-sphere- ROI with the 3 cohorts combined (n = 48)
extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: Abbreviations: aR ²= adjusted R squared; SE: Standard Error; ALPS_R, ALPS_L: calculated ALPS-Index on right R and left L hemisphere of the brain. ALPS_comb: combined ALPS-Index, WMH_R, WMH_L: volume of WMH in 5 mm sphere ROI on right and left hemisphere, WMH_comb: left and right side combined. * significant difference with P < 0.05. Calculated with multivariate linear regression analyses, using age, sex, diagnose and cohort as confounding variable
